thread.title: Forex moves sideswipe global carmaker hopes

title: Forex moves sideswipe global carmaker hopes
text:
Forex moves sideswipe global carmaker hopes Friday, April 27, 2018 - 01:43
Recent sharp moves in the euro, yen and dollar are putting bumps in the road for the the world's biggest carmakers. In just one day, Daimler, Renault, Honda and Mazda all blame currencies for a negative impact on revenues, as they report their latest results. Ciara Lee reports.
